LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information into file. In ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version is fully operational. There is only one limitation – only 100 payments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.SigningSecretKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify webhook 'Signing Secret' from webhook detail's paqge.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.SupportMultiCurrency.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: By default plugin uses the primary currency of store, but you can enabled to use the customer's currency of the order.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.HidePostalCode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Hide the postal code field. Default is false. If you are already collecting a full billing address or postal code elsewhere, set this to true.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.EnablePaymentRequestButton.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Collect payment and address information from your customers using Apple Pay, Google Pay, Microsoft Pay, and the Payment Request API by using the Payment Request Button Element.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.Description.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Extra information about a product which will appear on your customer’s credit card statement. In the case that multiple products are billed at once, the first statement descriptor will be used. Only available on products of type=service. By default your customer will see this message 'NopCommerce Store'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.EnableEmailReceipts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Stripe will send payment or refund receipts automatically.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.ConnectedStripeAccount
LocaleResource.Value: Connected Stripe Account. You can send amount to another Stripe account minus your aplication fees.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.EnableConnectedStripeAccount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Connected Stripe Account, plugin will send money to connected Stripe account automatically.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.ConnectedStripeAccountPercent.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Application fee percent. Example 2% - it means that plugin will send 98% of amount to Connected Stripe Account.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.WebhookDescription
LocaleResource.Value: Important! Create Webhook from this page using the button 'Get webhook ID'. You need to have the live URL, not localhost. After it copy webhook secret key from Stripe Dashboard back to this page. Only Webhook can change the order payment status.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.WebhookError
LocaleResource.Value: Webhook was not created (see details in the log)

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.OldLibrary
LocaleResource.Value: Error. You has another plugin for Stripe with old Stripe.net.dll. Download the last release or uninstall and remove it from the folder 'Plugins'. This plugin uses the new library Stripe.net.dll.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.PaymentMethodDescription
LocaleResource.Value: Pay by credit or debit card.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.WrongStripePaymentIntentKey
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Stripe. Wrong Stripe Payment Intent Key.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.StripeDirect.WrongStripePaymentIntentStatus
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Stripe. Wrong Stripe Payment Intent Status '{0}'.
